channel.title: Add an authorization layer to your REST API :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add an authorization layer to your REST API Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 418 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Protect your API endpoints: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/protect-your-api Why is this here?: A majority of oktane customers placed “API Service Integration” under “Authentication for service apps”
